mapper.sql: id, portAddr, monitorType, frequency, timeout, overtimes, alarmInterval, alarmMethod, alarmTime, createTime, updateTime, status, survival
mapper.insert: insert into gm_port_param (id, portAddr, monitorType, frequency, timeout, overtimes, alarmInterval, alarmMethod, alarmTime, createTime, updateTime, status, survival) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monitorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frequency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{timeout,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{overtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{interval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{alarmMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{survival,jdbcType=INTEGER})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into gm_port_param ( portAddr, monitorType, frequency, timeout, overtimes, alarmInterval, alarmMethod, alarmTime, createTime, updateTime, status, survival) values
( #{item.port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.monitorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.frequency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.timeout,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.overtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.interval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.alarmMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.alarmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.survival,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select count(*) from gm_port_param where portAddr = #{port}
